component.name: deleteNote
component.description: Moves a single existing Note to the trash

component.name: getNote
component.description: Retrieves the state of a single Note

component.name: shareNote
component.description: If this note is not already shared (via its own direct URL), then this will start sharing that note

component.name: stopSharingNote
component.description: If this note is not already shared then this will stop sharing that note

component.name: updateNote
component.description: Changes the content or metadata of a single existing Note
